SELECT MEMO_NO, MEMO_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM MEMO WHERE MEMO_TITLE LIKE ? ORDER BY MEMO_NO DESC
SELECT MEMO_NO, MEMO_TITLE, MEMO_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, MEMBER_NO FROM MEMO WHERE MEMO_NO = ?
SELECT MEMO_NO, MEMO_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM MEMO ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
